info.author: Artem Sazhin
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
Geweb is an asyncronous micro web framework based on gevent.

Installation
------------

    pip install geweb

Create project
--------------

    geweb init myproject

Run server
----------

    cd myproject
    geweb run

App structure
-------------

    |- myproject
        |- myapp
            |- templates/
                |- tmpl1.html
                |- tmpl2.html
                |- ...
            |- __init__.py
            |- urls.py
info.name: geweb
info.summary: Asyncronous micro web framework based on gevent.
info.html_description:
Geweb is an asyncronous micro web framework based on gevent.

Installation
------------

pip install geweb

Create project
--------------

geweb init myproject

Run server
----------

cd myproject
geweb run

App structure
-------------

|- myproject
|- myapp
|- templates/
|- tmpl1.html
|- tmpl2.html
|- ...
|- __init__.py
|- urls.py
